unnormalised: **Social Media & Influencer Marketing: Are You REALLY Tracking Your Followers, Yaar?**
normalised: social media and influencer marketing are you really tracking your followers yaar

unnormalised: Hey Influencer gang and social media gurus! Are you still just counting likes and shares? It’s 2024, people, and follower analytics are your secret weapon for *real* impact! Think beyond just vanity metrics. Are your followers in Mumbai *actually* engaging with your content about Rajasthani handicrafts?
normalised: hey influencer gang and social media gurus are you still just counting likes and shares it's two thousand and twenty four people and follower analytics are your secret weapon for real impact think beyond just vanity metrics are your followers in Mumbai actually engaging with your content about Rajasthani handicrafts

unnormalised: Dig deeper! Platforms are offering insane insights now. Demographics, interests, activity times – it's all there! You can figure out that most of your Ahmedabad audience is online between 7 PM and 9 PM after their daily dose of *saas-bahu* serials. Target your posts accordingly!
normalised: dig deeper platforms are offering insane insights now demographics interests activity times it's all there you can figure out that most of your Ahmedabad audience is online between seven p m and nine p m after their daily dose of saas-bahu serials target your posts accordingly

unnormalised: Heard Pooja Sharma's campaign for her new saree collection flopped? Turns out, she was promoting to a Gen Z audience at 14:00 hrs on 10/10/2023 who are more into crop tops! Don't be like Pooja!
normalised: heard Pooja Sharma's campaign for her new saree collection flopped turns out she was promoting to a Gen Z audience at two p m on tenth October two thousand and twenty three who are more into crop tops don't be like Pooja

unnormalised: Use those follower analytics, folks. Tailor your content, boost engagement, and see those brand deals with companies like Tata sky roll in like crazy! Remember, knowledge is power and 15/08/1947 is not the only important date! So, go forth and analyze!
normalised: use those follower analytics folks tailor your content boost engagement and see those brand deals with companies like T A T A sky roll in like crazy remember knowledge is power and fifteenth August nineteen forty seven is not the only important date so go forth and analyze
